text: Wendy Hughes (29 July 1952 â€“ 8 March 2014) was an Australian actress. She worked mostly in television and theatre. Hughes' career began in the mid-1970s. She also appeared in movies. Some of which includes Newsfront, Kostas, My Brilliant Career, Lucinda Brayford, and Touch and Go. Hughes died in Sydney from cancer, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Sydney
title: Wendy Hughes
